function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Mixed perspectives on lockdown life may lead to conflicting interpretations of the images.","Impact":"Misunderstandings and misinterpretations of the message conveyed by the images.","Mitigation":"Provide clear communication and context alongside the images to avoid misinterpretation.","Technologies":"Communication tools, image annotation software.","People":"Participants, viewers, and researchers analyzing the images.","Owner":"Study organizers and participants."},{"Description":"Variety of responses in category 7 may indicate different emotional and spatial needs, possibly reflecting differing living conditions.","Impact":"Inequality in living conditions and access to essential resources highlighted in the images.","Mitigation":"Address inequality through social support programs and community initiatives.","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, social impact assessment platforms.","People":"Individuals with diverse living conditions, policymakers, and social support organizations.","Owner":"Government agencies, non-profit organizations, and community leaders."},{"Description":"Less pleasant aspects associated with routine activities may reveal hygiene and maintenance challenges in the living environments.","Impact":"Exposure to potential health hazards and unsanitary living conditions.","Mitigation":"Provide resources for hygiene and maintenance support, promote education on home hygiene.","Technologies":"Smart home devices for maintenance, educational apps for hygiene practices.","People":"Residents living in the photographed environments, public health organizations, and community leaders.","Owner":"Local authorities, public health agencies, and community organizations."}]}
